### Row 1

```{r}
#install.packages("palmerpenguins")
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(palmerpenguins)
#read_csv()
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
```

```{r}
#| title: Box Plot
p1 <- ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = species, y = bill_length_mm, fill = species)) +
  geom_boxplot()

ggplotly(p1)
```

```{r}
#| title: Scatter Plot

p2 <- ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, fill = species)) +
  theme_light() +
  geom_point()
  

ggplotly(p2)
```

### Row 2

```{r}
#| title: Table

penguins_filtered <- penguins %>%
  filter(island == "Chinstrap") %>%
  select(species, island, year, sex)

knitr::kable(penguins)
```
